name: SocialCareer
overview:
SocialCareer acts as a recruiting platform for everyone involved in the process of career search - Employers, Hiring Managers, HR, Talent Acquisition, Candidates & Employees. We are bringing the referral process online, allowing everyone to participate, raising the referral awards and significantly lowering the cost of recruiting!

SocialCareer allows anoyone to search specific job opportunities, tap into their social or professional network, make a trusted recommendation and receive GREAT cash rewards.

As a employer, you will broaden your reach to every passive candidate & reduce the cost of hiring top-notch talent.
